pymt.ui.widgets.tabs¶

class pymt.ui.widgets.tabs.MTTabs(**kwargs)¶

Class that implement a tabbed notebook. When you add a widget into tabs, make sure they are at least one tab information

tabs = MTTabs() w = MTWidget() w.tab = ‘Title of tab’ tabs.add_widget(w)

or

tabs = MTTabs() w = MTWidget() tabs.add_widget(w, tab=’Title of tab’)

If you want to select a tab, use select()

tabs = MTTabs() tabs.add_widget(MTButton(label=”Hello”), tab=’Tab1’) tabs.add_widget(MTButton(label=”World”), tab=’Tab2’) tabs.select(‘Tab2’)
